name: Coco And Bubu On The Chopping Block
name_original: Coco And Bubu On The Chopping Block
description:
Use your wits and feathers in this hectic 1v1 arena, where two rival bird chefs battle it out with... pickles... and eggs. Watch out, they might combine to make explosive reactions!

Made over 32 hours as a part of KiwiJam 2019.

Created by Patrick Lynch, Jordan Peat, Michelle Wu and Kaleb Campbell.
